definition: and/as well as/and so/but (not)/yet (not)/(indicates causal relation)/(indicates change of state)/(indicates contrast)
and/moreover/yet/for the time being/to be about to/both (... and...)

sentences.english: You’re probably one of those weirdos that doesn’t drink coffee in the morning either.
sentences.chinese: 而且你可能也是那种早晨不用喝咖啡的古怪人。

sentences.english: And the big money is with the brand advertisers.
sentences.chinese: 而且大品牌广告商拥有更多的广告费用。

sentences.english: The boys are seen with some style changes and dramatic smoky eye make up.
sentences.chinese: 男孩们看起来造型有了些变化，而且还化了烟熏妆。

sentences.english: It's fickle and full of angle brackets.
sentences.chinese: 它多变，而且还会充满标记符号。

sentences.english: As it turns out, a handful of scientific studies show that chicken soup really could have medicinal value.
sentences.chinese: 而且几项科学研究也表明，鸡汤的确具有药用价值。

sentences.english: Loess is widely distributed in China, and it mainly lies in the central and western regions.
sentences.chinese: 黄土在我国分布广泛，而且主要分布在中西部地区。

sentences.english: And I heard it helps to have funding in advance too.
sentences.chinese: 而且我听说这也有助于提前得到资助。

sentences.english: You can have a lot of fun for cheap close to campus.
sentences.chinese: 你可以在校园附近玩得很开心，而且花钱也不多。

sentences.english: And he has discovered many such grass-roots experts on douban. com.
sentences.chinese: 而且他在豆瓣网上已经找到了许多这样的草根专家。

sentences.english: And rarely should a man cry in pain.
sentences.chinese: 而且男人很少该在痛苦中哭泣。

sentences.english: The stipulation of ongoing law is a little fragmentary and omits some necessary provisions.
sentences.chinese: 现行法律的规定略嫌零散，而且存在着盲区。

sentences.english: Leo Fender’s guitars weren’t just versatile, they were also durable.
sentences.chinese: 利奥芬达的吉他不仅万能，而且耐久。

sentences.english: But investment in global health is in the national interest too, " Varmus told The Times.
sentences.chinese: 而且投资全球卫生也是国家利益的一部分。

sentences.english: That's true.And more Chinese step on the cover of "Times".
sentences.chinese: 没错，而且越来越多的中国人登上了时代周刊封面。

sentences.english: After all, it was nearly the same in both languages, and only two hours beforehand he had been helping to lug my bike about.
sentences.chinese: 而且仅仅在两小时之前他还帮我存放自行车呢。

sentences.english: Limitedly resistant to strong acid, strong alkali, strong oxidizing solution and strong solvent.
sentences.chinese: 而且更具有很高的热稳定性，抗强碱性及抗强溶剂性。

definition: not only (this one)/not just (...) but also
of/~'s (possessive particle)/(used after an attribute)/(used to form a nominal expression)/(used at the end of a declarative sentence for emphasis)
also/too/(in Classical Chinese) final particle implying affirmation
only/merely/no more than/but/however/anyway (to get back to a previous topic)/cannot be more (after adjectival)
still/still in progress/still more/yet/even more/in addition/fairly/passably (good)/as early as/even/also/else
only natural/as it should be/certainly/of course/without doubt
